bill.title: Primary Elections; Filing of Nomination Papers
bill.description: Moves the date of the primary election to the second Saturday of August. Requires nomination papers to be filed not later than 4:30 p.m. on the first Tuesday in June. Effective January 1, 2011. (HB2397 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, referral sheet 5
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-04-10 2:20pm in House conference room 325.

Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Wakai, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Luke, Mizuno.

(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 25).
(S) Passed First Reading.
